summary:
James Earl Jones is an amazing actor who has starred in many movies, TV shows, and plays. He's been acting since the 1960s! Some of his famous roles include Darth Vader in *Star Wars*, Mufasa in *The Lion King*, and Jack Jefferson in *The Great White Hope*. He won lots of awards, like the Academy Honorary Award and several Golden Globes.

On TV, he voiced characters on *The Simpsons* and starred in *Paris* and *Gabriel's Fire*, winning an Emmy for the latter. He also acted in plays like *Othello* and *On Golden Pond* on Broadway, winning two Tony Awards. Jones is truly a legend in the world of acting!
title: James Earl Jones on screen and stage
